2000.query: SPS Commerce EDI supply chain competitors 2000
2000.context: SPS Commerce, Inc. is a supply chain management software company focused on EDI, analytics, and retail supply chain network. Founded for EDI and supply chain connectivity.

competitors.name: Sterling Commerce (IBM)
competitors.notes: Major EDI provider offering on-premise solutions

competitors.name: GXS (OpenText)
competitors.notes: Leading EDI and B2B integration provider

competitors.name: Traditional EDI Providers
competitors.notes: Numerous on-premise EDI vendors dominated the market

competitors.notes: EDI VAN provider serving retail and supply chain markets

competitors.name: DiCentral
competitors.notes: EDI services provider for retail and supply chain integration

2025.context: SPS Commerce, Inc. is a supply chain management software company focused on EDI, analytics, and retail supply chain network. Retail supply chain network. Competing with traditional EDI.

competitors.name: Manhattan Associates
competitors.notes: Enterprise-level competitor in supply chain and commerce solutions, directly competing in cloud-based supply chain management services for retailers and distributors

competitors.name: E2open
competitors.notes: Major competitor in supply chain software and network solutions, offering cloud-based platform for supply chain visibility and collaboration

competitors.name: Cleo Integration Cloud
competitors.notes: Top EDI software alternative to SPS Commerce Fulfillment EDI, providing integration and data exchange solutions for supply chain partners

competitors.name: TrueCommerce EDI
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in EDI software market, offering electronic data interchange solutions for retail and supply chain connectivity

competitors.name: Cegid
competitors.notes: Leading retail-tech competitor with 21.44% market share in the category, significantly larger than SPS Commerce's 5.78% share

competitors.name: MuleSoft Anypoint Platform
competitors.notes: Alternative EDI and integration platform competitor, providing API-led connectivity and integration services for supply chain operations

competitors.name: Boomi
competitors.notes: Cloud-based integration platform competitor, offering similar EDI and supply chain integration capabilities

competitors.name: Logicbroker
competitors.notes: EDI and integration software competitor focused on connecting trading partners and enabling dropship and marketplace commerce
